{{Infobox Album | Name = Songs from the Underground | Cover = Linkin Park - Songs Underground.jpg | Type = EP | Artist = [[Linkin Park]] | Released = November 28, 2008 | Recorded = 1999-2008 | Genre = [[Nu metal]], [[rap rock]], [[alternative rock]], [[alternative hip hop]] | Length = 36:45 | Producer = [[Joe Hahn]], [[Andrew Murdock]], [[Rick Rubin]], [[Mike Shinoda]] | Chronology = [[Linkin Park]] non-studio album | Last album = ''[[Road to Revolution: Live at Milton Keynes]]''
(2007) | This album = '''''Songs from the Underground (EP)'''''
(2008) | Next album = ''[[A_Thousand_Suns#Track_listing|A Thousand Suns +: Live in Madrid]]''
(2008) }} '''''Songs from the Underground''''' is the third [[extended play]] released to the public by American rock band [[Linkin Park]]. It features songs previously released through the Linkin Park Underground fan club, as well as two live tracks from [[Projekt Revolution]] 2008; one never-before released, and another found in the iTunes-only EP ''Live from SoHo''. ==Background== ''Songs from the Underground'' features numerous songs released through Linkin Park Underground, the band's official fan club, as well as two live tracks from [[Projekt Revolution]] 2008. "And One" and "Part of Me" were included in the ''[[Hybrid Theory (EP)|Hybrid Theory]]'', the band's second extended play; "Dedicated" was a demo originally released in the 2002 ''LP Undergound 2.0'' EP. "Sold My Soul to Yo Mama", a track made by Linkin Park turntablist and sampler [[Joe Hahn]], which includes samples from songs "Points of Authority" and "[[Papercut (song)|Papercut]]", was released exclusively for ''LP Underground 3.0''. "Announcement Service Public" and "Qwerty" are found in the ''LP Underground 6.0''. "[[Hunger Strike (song)|Hunger Strike]]", a song by [[Temple of the Dog]], was performed by its lead singer [[Chris Cornell]] (whom the band toured with), and features a surprise guest appearance by Linkin Park lead vocalist [[Chester Bennington]]. Inside the physical CD, a leaflet can be found inside which includes a free trial for a membership at LPU, as well as a limited free download of a live version "[[Crawling (song)|Crawling]]", featuring Chris Cornell. ==Track listing== {{tracklist | writing_credits = yes | total_length = 36:45 | title1 = Announcement Service Public | writer1 = Linkin Park | length1 = 2:23 | title2 = Qwerty | note2 = studio version | writer2 = Linkin Park | length2 = 3:20 | title3 = And One | writer3 = [[Mike Shinoda]], [[Joe Hahn]], [[Brad Delson]], [[Chester Bennington]], Rob Bourdon | length3 = 4:28 | title4 = Sold My Soul to Yo Mama | writer4 = Hahn, Bennington, Shinoda | length4 = 1:56 | title5 = Dedicated | note5 = 1999 Demo | writer5 = Shinoda, Delson, Hahn, Bennington | length5 = 3:10 | title6 = Hunger Strike | note6 = Live from 2008 [[Projekt Revolution]] - [[Chris Cornell]] featuring Chester Bennington | writer6 = [[Chris Cornell]] | length6 = 4:12 | title7 = My December | note7 = piano version | writer7 = Shinoda | length7 = 4:12 | title8 = Part of Me | writer8 = Shinoda, Hahn, Delson, Bennington, Bourdon | length8 = 12:40 }} {{Track listing | writing_credits = yes | headline = Free download | collapsed = yes | total_length = | title9 = [[Crawling (song)|Crawling]] | note9 = featuring Chris Cornell - includes verses from "Hands Held High" | writer9 = Linkin Park | length9 = 4:50 }} ==See also== *[[Linkin Park discography]] ==References== {{Reflist}} {{Linkin Park}} [[Category:2008 EPs]] [[Category:Albums produced by Mike Shinoda]] [[Category:English-language EPs]] [[Category:Linkin Park albums]] [[Category:Warner Bros.
